pull.title: ci: Switch more tasks to self-hosted
pull.body: This is recommended by Cirrus CI to reduce the costs. See also https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/28098

events.body:

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#28187](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28187) (ci: Run "macOS native x86_64" job on GitHub Actions by hebasto)
* [#28087](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28087) (ci: Use qemu-user through container engine by MarcoFalke)
* [#28076](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28076) (util: Replace std::filesystem with util/fs.h by MarcoFalke)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

events.body:
Looks like there is an intermittent issue, which is fixed in podman 4.1:

```
#135258	REDUCE cov: 2818 ft: 7924 corp: 483/10261b lim: 254 exec/s: 3468 rss: 251Mb L: 15/177 MS: 1 EraseBytes-
#135494	NEWError: timed out waiting for file /var/lib/containers/storage/overlay-containers/2b5173104c7716f28471c2aed46932cd57b0904326ef3b5e3c9c0462dad553a6/userdata/75976ef6638693018268a2b4187292027a833405bd50e9ab4a3ddccae789be0b/exit/2b5173104c7716f28471c2aed46932cd57b0904326ef3b5e3c9c0462dad553a6: internal libpod error

Exit status: 255

events.message:
ci: Only create folders when needed

Now that container volumes are used, the folders are no longer mounted.
They are only needed when running without a container engine (docker,
podman).

ci: Use hard-coded root path for CI containers

This also starts a fresh depends volume with a "_base" suffix, because
the folder structure has changed and depends embeds the folder names in
its compilation results.
ci: Switch more tasks to self-hosted
